T02D1779:273a-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s+yashta mantra sto tra n'a ma /
T02D1779:273a-3: dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1779:273a-4: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1779:273a-5: aom grub par gyur cig / h'um h'um phat ces
T02D1779:273a-6: drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gsum gyi khong ni
T02D1779:273a-8: ha ha ta ta zhes bzhad sgra yis gang zhig
T02D1779:273b-0: dus kun du ni shin tu 'jigs mdzad @273b cing
T02D1779:273b-1: ; / kam kam kam zhes thod pa'i phreng bas
T02D1779:273b-2: dbu la spras shing nag po'i mthu dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D1779:273b-3: ; sku // bhrum bhrum bhrum zhes khros pa'i mchog
T02D1779:273b-4: gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa'i khva gdangs sha
T02D1779:273b-5: ; sku // za zhing // dbu skra dang ni
T02D1779:273b-6: smar ches ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyod khyod
T02D1779:273b-8: ram ram ram zhes spyan mar 'khrug cing bsgyur mdzad krum krum krum zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs //
T02D1779:273b-9: smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod //
T02D1779:273b-10: ha ha h'um dang k'i li k'i li zhes sgrogs phyag g-yon kha tv'am gar bcas thod pa bsnams //
T02D1779:273b-11: ru ru ru zhes khrag rgyun 'bab pa phyag gis bsnams shing gsol ba 'thungs pa la dgyes shing //
T02D1779:273b-12: kham kham kham zhes gtum pa'i phyag g-yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pa'i //
T02D1779:273b-13: tam tam tam zhes da ma ru can 'di yis 'dul tshad 'khor bcas zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs //
T02D1779:273b-14: rab tu rngam zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing //
T02D1779:273b-15: ksham ksham ksham zhes bzod pa'i thugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste //
T02D1779:273b-16: gcig pus sna tshogs mnan cing mnan nas ha ka
T02D1779:273b-17: ha ka brjod mdzad char sprin sngon po'i mdog /
T02D1779:273b-18: sku la mi yi sha dang rgyu mas brel ba'i
T02D1779:273b-19: rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan cing zhal du gsol //
T02D1779:273b-20: drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung bo ro langs tshogs //
T02D1779:273b-21: ma lus bzung nas myur du bsad pa rnams kyi mgo bo'i khrag rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gsol //
T02D1779:273b-22: hrim kshim shr'im gi sngags kyi gsungs can pa tsa
T02D1779:273b-23: pa tsa'i sngags kyis bgegs rnams rab tu sreg /
T02D1779:273b-24: rol pas rol pa sel zhing mi yis gang ba'i
T02D1779:273b-25: mtsho la zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzad //
T02D1779:273b-26: phem phem phat ces sgrogs pa so sor bskyod pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus su bzhugs nas su //
T02D1779:273b-27: rigs kyi lus can srung bar mdzod cig sgrub bo
T02D1779:273b-28: rnams kyi zhing rnams nges par skyong mdzod cig /
T02D1779:273b-29: phyugs rnams kyis ni nyin ra bzhin du bgegs dang
T02D1779:273b-30: sdig 'joms dri med brnyes pa chu nyi bzhin //
T02D1779:273b-31: tsam tsam tsam zhes gtum po'i shugs kyis rab g-yos
T02D1779:274a-0: rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten snang mdzad @274a *
T02D1779:274a-2: / krim krim krim zhes gshegs pas dgra bo nyon
T02D1779:274a-3: mongs pa rnams nges par nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing
T02D1779:274a-4: // sam sam sam zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dag
T02D1779:274a-5: thos cing 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs
T02D1779:274a-6: // // bam bam bam zhes gshin rje ltar 'gro
T02D1779:274a-7: dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad
T02D1779:274a-8: // // cing // yam yam yam zhes rlung gi
T02D1779:274a-9: shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten
T02D1779:274a-10: // // cing // gnod byed mkhyen // klam klim
T02D1779:274a-11: klum zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan
T02D1779:274a-12: dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang //
T02D1779:274a-13: pam pam pam zhes thugs rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong ba //
T02D1779:274a-14: sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyi sngags pa rnams la 'bras bu blo gros mtshungs med ster //
T02D1779:274a-15: zhing rnams skyod bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyang du gso //
T02D1779:274a-16: sgrub pa po yi slob dpon 'ga' zhig dam tshig gang zhig blo ldan gus pa yi //
T02D1779:274a-17: thung nyis su ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par gyur pa dang //
T02D1779:274a-18: tshe dang dpal dang grags dang mthu stobs 'byor ba 'dzin dang gzi brjid rgyas pa mtshungs pa med //
T02D1779:274a-19: sa steng dang ni mtho ris su'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1779:274a-20: dpal nag po chen po la bstod ba rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1779:274a-21: slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal mnga' nas mdzad pa'o //
T02D1779:274a-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri bee ro tsa na badzra dang /
